mapper.select: select c.id,c.AccountNO,a.AccountType,a.State,c.MobilePhone,c.SubmitTime, a.Balance as aBalance,c.Balance as cBalance,m.ServiceFee, c.RefundTime,c.DealResult,c.DealTime,c.RefundResult from BAR_Account_Cancel c LEFT JOIN BAR_Account a ON a.AccountNO = c.AccountNO LEFT JOIN BAR_Merchant m ON m.MerchantCode = c.MerchantCode where c.id = #{value}
